responseBody._links: object (description: Domain to get all holidays)

parameters.federal: string (description: A boolean parameter. If true or 1, will return only federal holidays. If false or 0, will return no federal holidays)
parameters.optional: string (description: A boolean parameter. If false or 0 (default), will return only legislated holidays. If true or 1, will return optional holidays from Alberta and BC)

array of 'Holiday' objects.date: string (description: ISO date: the literal date of the holiday)

array of 'Holiday' objects.id: integer (description: Primary key for a holiday)
array of 'Holiday' objects.observedDate: string (description: ISO date: when this holiday is observed)
array of 'Holiday' objects.optional: integer (description: Whether this is a province-wide statutory holiday, or one that is optional for employers)

array of 'Province' objects.optional: integer (description: Whether this province optionally observes a given holiday)
array of 'Province' objects.sourceEn: string (description: Name of reference page with public holidays for this region)
array of 'Province' objects.sourceLink: string (description: URL to public holidays reference for this region)
